DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether added food ingredient ( ) affect glycaemic response liquid meal tolerance test ( LMTT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Glycaemic Response Liquid Meal Tolerance Test
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female ( le 40 % Male ) 2 . Aged 18 55 year 3 . Non Smokers 4 . Have body mass index 18.5 29.99 kg/m2 5 . Healthy , nondiabetic , gastric bypass surgery 6 . Not allergic dairy , soy 7 . Have fast plasma glucose ( fingerstick ) < 100 mg/dl ( < 5.5 mmol/L ) 8 . Willing able provide write informed consent
